title: War Department Asks Industry to Make More Than 300K Drones, Quickly, Cheaply
description: The War Department requested information earlier this week to gauge industry's willingness and ability to make some 300,000 drones quickly and inexpensively — a concrete effort by Secretary of War Pete Hegseth to directly meet the "drone dominance" goals laid…
content:
December 2, 2025
By C. Todd Lopez, Pentagon News
